definitions.definition: A halogenated hydrocarbon , trichloromethane , CHCl 3 ; it is a volatile, sweet-smelling liquid, used extensively as a solvent and formerly as an anesthetic .
examples: Some assume that chloroform is a gas because it was given by inhalation.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) A halogenated hydrocarbon , trichloromethane , CHCl 3 ; it is a volatile, sweet-smelling liquid, used extensively as a solvent and formerly as an anesthetic .
